recipes.name: Mushroom Bourguignon
recipes.instructions: start by sautéing chopped onions, garlic, and carrots in olive oil until they soften. Add sliced mushrooms and cook until they’re browned and release their moisture. Pour in red wine, let it simmer and reduce into a rich, flavorful sauce, then season with salt, pepper, and herbs before serving warm.

instructions: Boil whole wheat durum pasta in water with pinch of salt and 1tsp oil
